body: idk man, does not feel rewarding.

Eh, she actually has sex with her boyfriend. Well, I guess it’s meant to be a comedy and spicy cheating story but it’s the dissonance between her being a “shoujo” heroine and a slut who puts out her anyone. Her inner monologue of loving only her boyfriend rings hollow when she sleeps with everyone. I know it’s just a story but it’s a mess because of the way it’s written.
It's been almost two years, and I still can't find this chapter translated
It is her boyfriend for anyone wondering, the kanji checks out
Does the bf ever question why her pussys so loose? Especially after fucking that many guys and all of them nutting in her? She must have a stack of pills hidden somewhere
I can't read this, did she actually fuck her boyfriend? After chapters of her cheating on him with guys she just met?

So it only took 16 chapters of her being a slut to finally give her boyfriend some .. this series was meh at best. I mean the whole concept of her and him never had time to do it but she  found time to do it with other guys didn’t make any sense. I was hoping for the Last chapter everything she’s done would’ve gotten exposed. This chick clearly didn’t deserve to be loved her boyfriend. But leave it to this series to disappoint until the very end
Nani? She's finally fucking her bf instead of random ass dudes? Didn't think it was possible...
Is that her boyfriend or another guy? After 17 chapters they finally did it? or not? I already forgot who her bf is lol.
Ride till I cant no more
